resources.string: More than 8 years of managerial and administrative experience provided me with the ability to work in teams and moulded me into an entrepreneur. Throughout my education I gained knowledge for managing services industry, project planning and business development. Looking for a position to further polish my skills and build on my experience.

Completed the first year by passing the exams in Computer Fundamentals, Computational Thinking and Problem-Solving, Interpersonal Skills for IT, UX/UI Design and Usability, Programming Essentials, Management Information Systems, Networking Technologies, Mathematics, and Software-Defined Computing. Gaining all the necessary skills to work in software development, computer programming, cyber-security, and computer networks settings.
BACHELOR’S DEGREE: PRODUCTION OF GOODS AND SERVICES
Completed a technical program focused on physics, mathematics, computer science, goods production and management, as well as operational logistics.

The specialization covers interactive programming in Python, principles of computing, and algorithmic thinking. Upon completion, will be able to carry out object-oriented programming (OOP), understand algorithms, and be familiar with graph theory and tree data structure.
CERTIFICATE: SWITCHING, ROUTING, AND WIRELESS ESSENTIALS
Acquiring skills needed to configure and troubleshoot VLANs, Wireless LANs, and Inter-VLAN routing and troubleshoot redundancy on a switched network using STP and EtherChannel.
Gaining an understanding of how Linux is used and mastering Linux commands.
Playing chess—great way to unwind, distress, and keep the mind sharp.
Make and plan annual trips to different countries to experience new cultures.
Actively volunteer at a local community soup kitchen twice a month to prepare and serve food.
Blogging about food, including recipes, cooking, and food photography
Plan and participate in a football tournament.

I hold an IT Essentials: PC Hardware & Software and Introduction to Networks certificates, and I am currently wrapping up Switching, Routing, and Wireless Essentials and NDG Linux Essentials courses. I have also enrolled in a Fundamentals of Computing Specialization course and should complete it by the summer of 2022. I am also in the middle of acquiring an NFQ Level 7 Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science. Thanks to all that, I am familiar with development languages Python and Java, as well as Linux OS. I am able to configure and maintain common applications like MySQL and DNS, and I understand object-oriented design, algorithm design, data structures, problem-solving, and complexity analysis. Over the course of my career, I have held various positions and all of them required me to be extremely creative and flexible. Due to the nature of my roles, I have become adept at handling ambiguous and undefined problems and have developed the ability to think abstractly. In the past year, I realized that I would really like to get into the IT industry, so I started taking courses and did a lot of self-learning. Now, I am looking for a suitable place that can help me use all my potential and direct my growth. I would be thrilled to become a part of your team and further expand my knowledge and skills. I am sure that I am the perfect candidate for this internship due to my positive attitude, willingness to learn, and hardworking nature. I would love to get an opportunity to explain in more detail why I think our collaboration would be mutually beneficial.
